infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: AgriCrew needs access to your photo library to allow you to select and upload your profile picture and other relevant images.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: AgriCrew needs camera access to take new photos for your profile, job listings, or chat.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: AgriCrew would like to send you notifications for new job offers, application updates, and chat messages to keep you informed.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: AgriCrew needs your location to show you relevant jobs or workers nearby.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: AgriCrew needs microphone access to record and send voice messages in chat.
